Technicalities (comment later)

```{r}

## Output filename
outputFile <- ".csv"
paramFile <- ".rds"

## Verbose mode
verbose <- TRUE

## Number of decimal places
ndec <- 4

```

Input parameters

```{r}

## Number of replications
replications <- 50

## Length of the simulation
timesteps <- 11000

## Number of factors
k <- 3

## Correlation
correlation <- 0.2

## Testing stuff here ## 
load(paste0(baseDir, "/FunctionsLoads/Loads/models"))
load(paste0(baseDir, "/FunctionsLoads/Loads/some_models"))

## Identify the number of predictors of each model
predictors <- getPredictors(models)

## Generate Betas
weights <- generateBetas(models)

## modelselection 
modelSelection <- "hard"

```

ID variables to be looped over: 

```{r}

#ID variables that they all loop over
populations <- list("Mave", "Rey", "Tess","Bo", "All") 
sampleSizes <- list(100) 

#Things we vary. 
sigmas <- list(0.2, 0.5, 0.8) #0.2, 0.5, 0.8 
tMods <- list(2, 7, 13) #2, 7, 13. 
modelCompares <- list(AIC, BIC) #AIC, BIC 

```

set seed 

```{r}

seeds <- seedGenerator(replications, paste0(inputDir, "/seeds.csv"))

```

Run the function 

```{r}

for (population in populations){
  for (sigma in sigmas){
    for (sampleSize in sampleSizes){
      for (tMod in tMods){
        for (modelCompare in modelCompares){
simulatorLoop(replications, timesteps, models, k, tModel,
  nRey, nTess, nBo, nMave, weights, sampleSize, correlation, sigma,
  modelCompare, modelSelection, inputDir, outputDir, outputFile, paramFile,
  verbose, ndec, seeds)
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

```
